duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality patient care in the Medical Surgical department at Duke Regional Hospital in Durham, NC.
Assess and monitor patients, administer medications, and liaise with the healthcare team to ensure optimal patient outcomes.
Document patient care and maintain accurate medical records in compliance with hospital policies and procedures.
Assist in wound care and patient education, providing support and guidance to patients and their families.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to develop and implement individualized care plans for patients.
Adhere to healthcare compliance standards and participate in quality improvement initiatives to enhance patient safety and satisfaction.
